channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect 16
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect 16

item.title: CVE-2023-48678|2024-08-16T19:22:09.595Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2016
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to insecure folder permissions. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 16 (Linux, Windows) before build 37391.
